issue.title: [C++] Make CSV nulls configurable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4087](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4087). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It could be useful to allow the user to configure the set of strings recognized as nulls.

comments.body:
